item.title: Shackets are popular right now. Take fashion inspiration from Janhvi Kapoor and Gigi Hadid.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: Every now and then, celebrities take a basic fashion trend and carefully transform it into a hot favorite and must-have for every aspiring fashionista. This winter, we’ll introduce you to a new piece of fusion fashion that several celebrities and models have already embraced as a must-have in their western wardrobes. Shackets! WHAT EXACTLY IS […]
item.content:encoded:
Every now and then, celebrities take a basic fashion trend and carefully transform it into a hot favorite and must-have for every aspiring fashionista. This winter, we’ll introduce you to a new piece of fusion fashion that several celebrities and models have already embraced as a must-have in their western wardrobes. Shackets!

WHAT EXACTLY IS A SHACKET?

Gigi Hadid dressed down in a denim shacket.
You may have heard about them or seen them but were unable to identify what they were. Let us tell you a sweet love story. It all began when a lovely jacket met a stern shirt. They fell in love and decided to marry by melting into each other’s arms. As a result, the shacket was born! THE new fashion trend is the casual jacket that looks like a shirt but isn’t quite a shirt. It’s simply impossible to get enough of it.

The best thing about shackets is that you can mix and match them with anything. Have a pair of chunky faux leather boots and a slip dress? Shake it up! Thinking about what to wear on your date but don’t want to appear too bulky with layers of warm clothing? Simply shacket it!

If you’re still perplexed, take a look at these celebs who are rocking shackets and doing so in style!

JANHVI KAPOOR

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Janhvi Kapoor (@janhvikapoor)

Janhvi Kapoor is never afraid to try out a new look. So it was pretty obvious that she’d be removing a shacket like a diva. And she didn’t let me down! Janhvi wore a white crop top, skirt, and shacket with a white denim shacket. We’re obsessed with this girl-next-door look.

GIGI HADID

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Gigi Hadid (@gigihadid)

Gigi Hadid looks great in almost every outfit she wears, but it’s her fun, casual style that we’re obsessed with. Consider her all-denim ensemble, which she paired with black lace-up boots and socks. Gigi, a new mom, appears to take casualness very seriously!

PARINEETI CHOPRA

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Parineeti Chopra (@parineetichopra)

Parineeti Chopra’s color palette of a denim shacket, black pants, and a white top will be our new go-to look. She accessorized her ensemble with a crossbody bag and a pair of gold hoops. With some sleek accessories and a dainty purse, you’ll be ready for brunch in no time!

NAVYA NAVELI NANDA

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Navya Naveli Nanda (@navyananda)

Navya Naveli’s checked shacket with distressed jeans and boots reinvents street style. Navya wore her hair open and a pair of eye-catching black sunglasses. On your way to college or meeting up with a friend for coffee? Allow Navya to lead the way.

KIARA ADVANI

Kiara Advani’s entire look.

Kiara Advani was imprisoned in a shacket.

Kiara Advani stepped out in a cream shacket, a white crop top, and neon orange tights. Kiara accessorized her look with a monochrome tote bag and Chanel shoes. An uncomplicated but stunning look. Don’t you agree?

Which of these looks is your favorite?

item.title: Samsung teases Unpacked 2022 event in February: What to Expect
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: The launch of the Samsung Galaxy S22 series is just around the corner, with the company confirming that its Unpacked 2022 event will take place in February. Samsung promises that the next generation flagships will provide a better user experience. Samsung President TM Roh hinted in a blog post that the Galaxy S series could […]
item.content:encoded:
The launch of the Samsung Galaxy S22 series is just around the corner, with the company confirming that its Unpacked 2022 event will take place in February. Samsung promises that the next generation flagships will provide a better user experience. Samsung President TM Roh hinted in a blog post that the Galaxy S series could include a Note-series-like device as well. It is also expected to unveil its new Galaxy Tab S8 tablets at the event. Here’s a rundown of everything Samsung is expected to reveal next month.

The date of the Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2022 event has been leaked.

While the company has yet to confirm the event date, Ice Universe, a well-known leaker, claimed on Weibo that Samsung will hold its Galaxy Unpacked 2022 event on February 9. However, according to a report in the Korean publication DDaily, the event could begin on February 8. According to reports, the event will begin at 23:00 PM CST, which is 8:30 PM in India.

What can we expect from the Samsung Unpacked 2022 event?

The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra is widely rumored to be the new Samsung Galaxy Note series phone this year, something that the company’s President has also hinted at. The terms “notable S series” and “the next evolution of Galaxy” both refer to the same thing. The company has also posted a short video on YouTube, implying that the brand intends to offer a mix of Galaxy S and Note series, which the Galaxy S22 Ultra may offer.

“At Unpacked in February 2022, we’ll unveil the most notable S series device we’ve ever created.” “The next generation of Galaxy S is here, combining the best of our Samsung Galaxy into one ultimate device,” he wrote.

“We understand that many of you were disappointed when Samsung did not release a new Galaxy Note last year. You adored the Galaxy Note series’ unrivaled creativity and efficiency, which allowed you to transition from gaming nirvana to high-octane productivity in the blink of an eye. You gushed about the lifelike S Pen, which many compare to writing with ink on paper. And we haven’t forgotten about the things you enjoy,” he added.

Samsung is expected to release three smartphones this year, including the Galaxy S22, Galaxy S22 Plus, and Galaxy S22 Ultra. The top-tier Ultra model is said to have a unique design. It may resemble Samsung’s Galaxy Note phablets and include an S-Pen slot. According to previous rumors and leaks, this one will also have a curved display, similar to the Galaxy Note 20. The Galaxy S22 Ultra may have a large 6.81-inch screen. A 5,000mAh battery and a 108-megapixel quad-camera setup were also visible. A 12-megapixel ultra-wide camera, a 10-megapixel 10x telephoto camera, and a 10-megapixel 3x telephoto camera are said to be included.

In some countries, all three Samsung Galaxy S22 smartphones will most likely be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset. In India, the company could release devices with its new Exynos 2200 SoC and AMD graphics.

The Galaxy S22 and its Plus variant are also expected to get camera upgrades, such as a beefier primary camera and improved optical zoom. Both handsets are expected to keep the old design and include a 50MP GN5 primary camera on the back. The standard model is expected to have a 6.01-inch screen, while the Plus is expected to have a 6.55-inch display.

Roland Quandt, a tipster, recently suggested that the company’s 2022 flagship could finally offer faster-charging speeds. The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra model is expected to support 45W charging. However, because Samsung does not include a charger in the box of its flagship phones, the charging brick may have to be purchased separately. Furthermore, the other two models are said to have only 25W fast charging, which is similar to older models.

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 series, in addition to the Galaxy S22 series, is expected to make its debut at the upcoming Unpacked 2022 event. While few details are known about the tablet’s specifications, it is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 888 or Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset. Three models could be unveiled by the company. The standard model is expected to have an 11.6-inch screen, while the Plus model may have a 12-inch screen. The Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra could have a massive 14.6-inch screen when it launches.

item.title: Rishabh Pant surpasses Rahul Dravid and MS Dhoni to set THIS record.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: Rishabh Pant, an Indian wicketkeeper/batsman, smashed 85 in the second One-Day International (ODI) against South Africa on Friday (January 21). Pant took just 71 balls to make 85 and appeared to be on his way to his first ODI century before a loose shot against Tabraiz Shamshi cost him his wicket. However, his 85-run home […]
item.content:encoded:
Rishabh Pant, an Indian wicketkeeper/batsman, smashed 85 in the second One-Day International (ODI) against South Africa on Friday (January 21).

Pant took just 71 balls to make 85 and appeared to be on his way to his first ODI century before a loose shot against Tabraiz Shamshi cost him his wicket.

However, his 85-run home run was enough to put him in the record books.

His 85th ODI score in South Africa is now the highest by an Indian wicketkeeper.

Pant passed Rahul Dravid to become the 78th player to reach the milestone. MS Dhoni (65), Rahul Dravid (62), and Saba Karim are the other Indians on the list (55).

India needs to win the second ODI to keep the series alive after losing the first. India won the toss and chose to bat first, but Dhawan fell early and Kohli also fell for naught.

Pant and Rahul came together and put on a 115-run stand for the third wicket, but SA struck again, taking back-to-back wickets of Rahul and Pant to end India’s innings.

item.title: Radian Aerospace has raised $27.5 million to build the world’s first spaceplane.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: Radian Aerospace is working on a spaceplane that can transport people and light cargo to low-Earth orbit. The space plane will be fully reusable and capable of returning to Earth within 48 hours of landing. It will also be able to deliver up to 2,270 kgs anywhere in the world in under an hour. More […]
item.content:encoded:
• Radian Aerospace is working on a spaceplane that can transport people and light cargo to low-Earth orbit.
  • The space plane will be fully reusable and capable of returning to Earth within 48 hours of landing.
  • It will also be able to deliver up to 2,270 kgs anywhere in the world in under an hour.

More people are flying to and from space, making space travel more accessible. There are advancements in various space travel means, such as a hot air balloon that will allow you to travel to the stratosphere. Another option for space travel is to use a plane that can transport both people and payloads.

Radian Aerospace, based in Washington, is developing a spaceplane called ‘Radian One,’ which recently received $27.5 million in seed funding. Radian One, the “world’s first fully functional horizontal takeoff and landing, single-stage to orbit vehicle,” will be developed with the funds.

So far, the company has been operating in stealth mode, focusing on the design and early development of the space plane, and the new investment will propel it forward.

The spaceplane Radian One

Radian One will be shaped and designed like a plane, which means it will have wings, which will make a significant difference in spaceflight. As a result, it will carry out aircraft-like operations, delivering people and light cargo to low-Earth orbit (LEO). In contrast to current vertical liftoffs, the space plane will launch and land horizontally. However, the space plane will require some assistance during takeoff, which will be provided by a sled.

Radian One will be able to perform a mission, refuel, and fly again 48 hours after touchdown, in addition to flying to space. The spacecraft is designed to be fully reusable, with the ability to stay in orbit for five days.

According to space.com, the Radian One is also designed to fly here on Earth, with the ability to deliver up to 2,270 kgs anywhere in the world in less than an hour.

According to the company, its focus is not on space tourism, but on making space travel more convenient. “We are not focused on tourism; we are dedicated to missions that improve life on our own planet, such as research, in-space manufacturing, and terrestrial observation, as well as critical new missions such as rapid global delivery right here on Earth,” said Richard Humphrey, Radian’s CEO, and co-founder.

Radian’s solution is said to be a low-cost space transportation system that can aid in the development of new aerospace markets. However, no launch date for the Radian One has been revealed as of yet, but the ambitious space plane is worth the wait.

item.title: Oppo wants to create devices that run on mobile and Wi-Fi signals rather than batteries.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: Whether it’s a mobile phone, a laptop, a tablet, or earbuds, nearly every personal gadget today is powered by a battery. However, Oppo, one of the world’s largest technology companies, believes that batteries are not the future, at least for IoT devices such as wireless earphones. It has now outlined a vision in which such […]
item.content:encoded:
Whether it’s a mobile phone, a laptop, a tablet, or earbuds, nearly every personal gadget today is powered by a battery. However, Oppo, one of the world’s largest technology companies, believes that batteries are not the future, at least for IoT devices such as wireless earphones. It has now outlined a vision in which such devices will be powered by mobile signals, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth rather than batteries, which could change the way we use these products. Oppo has released a research paper titled “Zero Power Consumption Communication,” which focuses on a system that includes devices that consume no power.

Although it is only a theory at this point, the zero power consumption communication system will not use batteries for power and will instead rely on waves for charging. These devices will be ultra-portable and require much less power to operate, and with a battery-free mechanism, they will be longer-lasting and less expensive than current technology.

Batteries are an essential component of any personal electronic device that people carry with them. In contrast to the direct power supply system found on large appliances such as televisions and refrigerators, batteries enable devices to be portable. However, the way batteries work has several limitations.

The first and most important limitation is that they are consumable, which means they will become less effective and lose capacity as they age. Second, they take up a lot of room. If you’ve ever looked inside a smartphone, you’ll notice that the battery takes up the most space. They are also quite heavy. Given that they both use the same build material, a phone with a 6000mAh battery will most likely weigh more than a phone with a 4000mAh battery. Third, batteries are costly and add to the overall cost of your phone. Fourth, batteries are vulnerable to damage and explosions if the environment in which they operate changes slightly. You’ve probably heard about phones exploding. Finally, batteries are harmful to the environment.

Oppo wants to change everything. It has proposed technology for collecting radiofrequency energy from wireless connections such as mobile networks, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth, which originate from RF sources such as TV towers, FM towers, mobile network base stations, and Wi-Fi hotspots. By modulating and relaying incoming signals, they will be able to communicate.

What Oppo has envisioned appears efficient and promising, and if implemented, could improve the ease with which we use some gadgets. However, it will mostly be limited to devices with low energy requirements, so it is difficult to imagine zero power consumption communication technology being able to power devices such as smartphones.

item.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan, Selena Gomez, and Kriti Sanon are among the celebrities who demonstrated how to shine in blue gowns.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: The number of virtual parties has recently increased. After all, it’s a soothing remedy that instantly transforms a bad day into a good one. Let’s introduce you to some party glam to get you in the mood to dance. So, are we teasing you with a selection of dresses that seem enticingly appropriate? Indeed, there’s […]
item.content:encoded:
The number of virtual parties has recently increased. After all, it’s a soothing remedy that instantly transforms a bad day into a good one. Let’s introduce you to some party glam to get you in the mood to dance. So, are we teasing you with a selection of dresses that seem enticingly appropriate? Indeed, there’s so much to love about a sparkly dress that you only need a few accessories to complete your party look.

Say goodbye to dull days because we have deep shades of blue to keep you looking pretty. So, let’s see how bright a diamond you can be when you hit the dance floor with your friends. We learned from celebrities who looked stunning in blue gowns with a lot of glitz. Here’s how to put your dress together.

Malaika Arora

This is what it looks like to discover magic in your gown. The Socha Nahin Tha chose a blue sequin gown from Nedo by Nedret Taciroglu, which featured a thigh-high slit and a beaded neckline. Make this your cocktail party outfit; it’s simply stunning. Accessorize appropriately with studded jewelry and ankle-strap stilettos.

Kareena Kapoor Khan’s

The elegantly worn thigh-high slit. Bebo is so typical of himself. Her ink blue sequin dress with shoulder pads, turtleneck, full sleeves, and a drape-like detail looked stunning here, proving she’s a sight to behold at all times. Do you want to experiment with color blocking? Hot pink strappy stilettos will give you the big vibe you’re looking for.

Meghan Markle

Here’s the day when Meghan, the pregnant former Duchess of Sussex, defined regality with her taste in fashion. She wore a shimmery three-quarter sleeve Roland Mouret gown with a boat neck and a knee-high slit. She completed her look with a black clutch and ankle-strap stilettos.

Selena Gomez’s

She walked the hot girl route for the Grammys in a sparkly plunging neckline strappy gown, as she is the pro dresser of every red carpet event. This midnight blue cut-out number looked stunning when paired with hoop earrings.

Kriti Sanon

A sequin bodycon Bardot gown that has me completely smitten. Tell us about this mid-length dress with avant-garde sleeves you sold. It combined the one-shoulder and off-shoulder details in one dress. How often do you encounter something similar? It’s a once-in-a-lifetime find. Accessorize with pink pointed-toe pumps and dangler earrings.

Priyanka Chopra’s

The stunning lady told us she’s hotter than the tropics, and we believe her. She proves it every day, and her look for the Baywatch premiere is proof of that. The 39-year-old wore a plunging neckline wrap-style dress with a thigh-high slit and a high-low hem. This full-sleeved sequin ensemble was held together by a black fabric waist belt and black ankle-strap stilettos.

Which diva’s glitzy blue gown do you want to own? Please share your thoughts in the comments section.

item.title: Maharashtra reports 48270 new Covid-19 cases, with 52 deaths.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: According to the health department, Maharashtra recorded 48,270 new coronavirus cases on Friday, including 144 Omicron infections and 52 deaths. COVID-19 infections increased by 2,073 from the previous day. A total of 42,391 patients were discharged, bringing the total number of recovered patients to 70,09,823. According to Maharashtra Health Minister Rajesh Tope, despite a high […]
item.content:encoded:
According to the health department, Maharashtra recorded 48,270 new coronavirus cases on Friday, including 144 Omicron infections and 52 deaths.

COVID-19 infections increased by 2,073 from the previous day.

A total of 42,391 patients were discharged, bringing the total number of recovered patients to 70,09,823.

According to Maharashtra Health Minister Rajesh Tope, despite a high positive rate, at least 95% of beds are vacant or hospitalization is lower than in the second wave of COVID-19.

“In the state, 95% of the beds are vacant,” he said. Approximately 4-5% of patients are admitted to hospitals for treatment.”

He went on to say that the state’s positivity rate is 23.5 percent, but districts like Raigad, Pune, Nashik, and Nanded have a higher positive rate than the state average.

item.title: Animal rights activists have slammed Gucci for using real tigers in an ad campaign shoot.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: Gucci, an Italian luxury fashion house, has come under fire on social media for using real tigers in their advertising campaign. The Gucci Tiger Collection debuted earlier this month to commemorate the Chinese Year of the Tiger, which begins on February 1st. Many animal rights activists, including the founder of Big Cat Rescue, Carole Baskin, […]
item.content:encoded:
Gucci, an Italian luxury fashion house, has come under fire on social media for using real tigers in their advertising campaign. The Gucci Tiger Collection debuted earlier this month to commemorate the Chinese Year of the Tiger, which begins on February 1st. Many animal rights activists, including the founder of Big Cat Rescue, Carole Baskin, and PETA, were outraged by their decision to use real tigers for the shoot.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Gucci Official (@gucci)

One of the images from Gucci’s recent campaign features two tigers, one perched on a piano and the other posing on a rug. In another Instagram video shared by Gucci, a tiger is seen walking.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Gucci Official (@gucci)

World Animal Protection US also expressed their dismay on Twitter. “Gucci is sending the wrong message by promoting tigers as pets and luxury items when they are wild animals that belong in the wild,” according to the tweet.

Several netizens also expressed their opinions in the comments section of Gucci’s posts. “Please leave the wildlife alone,” one user wrote. “Tigers are beautiful in nature, not in marketing campaigns,” another commenter writes.

Gucci, on the other hand, stated in their disclaimer that no animals were harmed during the shoot. “Tigers were photographed and filmed in a separate safe environment in accordance with Gucci’s policies before being featured in the campaign,” the disclaimer continued. Netizens, on the other hand, are clearly not convinced.

item.title: WATCH: A comedy of errors ensues between Rahul and Pant before Keshav Maharaj blows a run-out opportunity.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: Pant nudged a delivery from Keshav Maharaj towards the leg side in the 15th over of India’s innings. While looking for a run, the left-hander was ball-watching as he saw Rahul reach his end from the non-end. striker’s As a result, both batters were at the same end of the field, creating a run-out opportunity. […]
item.content:encoded:
Pant nudged a delivery from Keshav Maharaj towards the leg side in the 15th over of India’s innings. While looking for a run, the left-hander was ball-watching as he saw Rahul reach his end from the non-end. striker’s As a result, both batters were at the same end of the field, creating a run-out opportunity.

Due to a communication breakdown, bowler Maharaj missed the throw that would have resulted in a run-out. As a result, there was no one to support the bowler because the mid-wicket fielder was stationed near the boundary line. As a result, by the time the ball returned to Maharaj, Rahul had stormed back to the non-end, the striker’s negating any damage for Team India.

Pant nudged a delivery from Keshav Maharaj towards the leg side in the 15th over of India’s innings. While looking for a run, the left-hander was ball-watching as he saw Rahul reach his end from the non-end. striker’s As a result, both batters were at the same end of the field, creating a run-out opportunity.

Due to a communication breakdown, bowler Maharaj missed the throw that would have resulted in a run-out. As a result, there was no one to support the bowler because the mid-wicket fielder was stationed near the boundary line. As a result, by the time the ball returned to Maharaj, Rahul had stormed back to the non-end, the striker’s negating any damage for Team India.

Here’s how the comedy of errors ensued between Rahul and Pant:

Pant – KL Rahul at the same end and South Africa missed a huge opportunity to take another wicket. pic.twitter.com/U4lhBmucYH

— Johns. (@CricCrazyJohns) January 21, 2022

After Pant-115-run Rahul’s fourth-wicket stand, India will be hard-pressed to score more than 300 in the second and penultimate ODI. While Pant was out for 85, missing out on a century, Rahul fell for a 79-ball 55 against the run of play.

India already lost the first One-Day International (ODI) on Wednesday. The visitors were restricted for 265-8 in their full quota of overs while chasing 297 and will need to up their game to level the series.
